query: Reliance Deep Woods gravel race Tennessee

videos.title: Gravel Events You Should Know About: SE USA Volume 2
videos.description:
Gravel Cycling Events that you should know about, Southeastern USA, Volume 2.

Not Corporate, Not Expensive, in what we like to call around here, 100% legit grass roots, not just calling themselves grass roots. More to come soon from other regions of the USA, and possibly outside of the USA. Stay tuned...

Enjoy - JOM, Founder of Gravel Cyclist

Chapters:
0:00 Introduction
0:42 Southeast Gravel Series - North & South Carolina
1:23 Skratch Ankle - Milton, Florida
1:53 Fried Clay 200K - Eatonton, Georgia
2:48 Spaghetti 100 - Miccosukee, Florida
3:34 Piggy's Revenge - Venice, Florida
4:15 Rule of Three - Bentonville, Arkansas
4:56 Arkansas Graveler - Mena, Arkansas
5:30 Arkansas High Country Race - Russellville, Arkansas
6:16 Chinkapin Hollow - Fayetteville, Arkansas
6:45 Croatan Buck Fifty - Cape Carteret, North Carolina
7:20 Transylvania Productions - Holly Shelter GG & Uwharrie Forest GG, North Carolina
8:09 Dirt Diggler - Hendersonville, North Carolina
8:35 Gosh Darn Gravel Gathering - Hickman County, Tennessee
9:08 Hardford 50 & Harderford 75 - Hartford, Tennessee
9:35 Reliance Deep Woods Gravel Grinder
10:15 Closing
11:20 General Madness

Links of Interest:
Gravel Events You Should Know About: SE USA Volume 1 - https://youtu.be/1PFe_j8Dq_Q

Southeast Gravel Series - https://www.southeastgravel.com

Skratch Ankle - https://www.scratchanklegravel.com

Fried Clay 200K - https://www.facebook.com/Friedclay/ - https://www.eventbrite.com/e/fried-clay-200k-2025-tickets-1046921529477

Spaghetti 100 - https://cccyclists.org/spaghetti100

Piggy's Revenge - https://www.scorrider.com/piggys-revenge

Rule of Three - https://www.ruleofthree.bike

Arkansas Graveler - https://www.arkansasgraveler.com

Arkansas High Country Race - https://www.arkansashighcountry.com

Chinkapin Hollow Gravel Grinder - https://www.chinkapinhollowgravelgrinder.com

Croatan Buck Fifty - https://croatanbuckfifty.com

Transylvania Productions - https://www.trans-sylvaniaproductions.com

Dirt Diggler - https://www.blueridgeadventures.net/ddgg

Gosh Darn Gravel Gathering - https://goshdarn.org

Rapid Expeditions - Hardford 50 & Harderford 75 - https://www.rapidexpeditions.com/

Reliance Deep Woods Gravel Grinder - https://www.tennesseegravel.com

Gravel Cyclist's Route Library - https://www.gravelcyclist.com/gravel-cycling-routes/

Gravel Bike Tire / Tyre Pressure Guidelines - https://www.gravelcyclist.com/bicycle-tech/gravel-bike-tyre-tire-pressure-guidelines-by-enve-composites/

Amazon Affiliation Link:
No cost to you, but every purchase made helps keep Gravel Cyclist up and running! - https://www.amazon.com/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=gravelcyclist-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=6b862b6af640d29360e2af2a5f17ddc6&camp=1789&creative=9325

Web: http://GravelCyclist.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/GravelCyclist
Instagram - http://Instagram.com/GravelCyclist
Twitter - http://twitter.com/GravelCyclist
tags: gravel events you should know about
videos.transcript:
good day trend setters coming to you
today with my next edition of gravel
cycling events you should know about the
Southeastern USA Edition volume two that
implies there was volume one it is
linked in the description below there's
quite a few events I simply forgot about
so it's time to correct that and get
cracking on with this video reminder
these events are not corporate and in
many cases not expensive and in the case
of some of the events in volume one they
might be free either way all of these
events are what I consider to be
Grassroots they give back to the local
community in no particular order let's
kick off with the southeast gravel
series which features six events in the
states of North Carolina and South
Carolina and is hosted by that bofin of
wheel manufacturing boy of boy cycling
whilst I haven't read any of the events
in the Southeastern gravel series I have
wrden in many the areas and one of my
favorite areas which is home to the
Valhalla race AKA Valhalla South
Carolina absolutely fantastic riding
bring your climbing gear and your
peepers because there's plenty of
scenery for you to Marvel at as you
scaling the endless asense the southeast
gravel series you can learn more by
checking out the link in the description
below the next event is scratch ankle a
very interesting name indeed this event
has been around for for many many years
and visits the Blackwater River State
Forest area of Florida up in the
Panhandle whilst I haven't ridden that
event I have ridden out of Milton
Florida which is where this event starts
and ends there are several routes on
offer including for those seeking big
miles a 200m option details of scratch
ankle are linked in the description
below the next event enters its fifth
year of operation for 2025 and it is the
fried clay 200k up in Eon Georgia AKA
Middle Georgia this event features
routes by the red clay ramble and the
fried green 50 which I believe is no
longer in existence a shame for certain
but on top of that the event promoter
Pat adds his own Touch of craziness and
will challenge you with many many
interesting roads and tracks and all
sorts of Madness should you decide to
sign up for this excellent event I have
ridden this event personally and it
royally or is it presidentially either
way it kicked my ass be sure to bring
your climbing gears because Middle
Georgia certainly is not flat whether
you decide to ride race or bik pack the
fried clay 200k the choice is up to you
more details are linked in the
description below next up a very
long-standing event presented to you by
the capito city cyclist whose home is
Tallahassee Florida aka the capital city
of Florida the spaghetti 100 the dirt
version is 62 Mi of fantastic red clay
Canopy Roads and the long version takes
you all the way into Southern Georgia
through a town known as Boston Georgia
the other Boston which is more than a
feeling I might add the ride starts in
the small town of mikasuki which is east
of Tallahassee and all proceeds benefit
a local kids on bikes program it gives
back to the community you have to love
that further details can be found Linked
In the description below another Florida
event this time near sarasot to Florida
hosted by the score organization scr it
is known as Piggies revenge and it is an
event I have ridden at least once this
event has many distances on offer there
is a 20m gravel offering for those so
inclined but if you're more adventurous
like I was when I last rode this vent
there's a 60m version which includes
about 20 mi of single track so it's
going to challenge your riding skills
and your
fortitude and everything else you can
find further details of Piggy's Revenge
Linked In the description below the next
event is based in Arkansas and I learned
today that Arkansas is considered to be
part of the southeast so that's news to
me you learn something new every day
this event is pretty crazy because it
features three typ typ of Road Services
pavement single track and gravel and if
I understand everything correctly you
can only use one bike to reverse all
those services this event is known as
the rule of three it is based out of
Bentonville Arkansas which in itself is
a cycling mea unfortunately I have not
ridden this event but it's on my list to
do you should consider doing it too you
can learn more details Linked In the
description below another event and this
one's in the Arkansas o Oz arks it is
known as the Arkansas graler the Ozarks
were made quite Famous by a TV show not
too long ago lovely spectacular scenery
everywhere this event is new it was
founded in 2024 but it is worthy of your
consideration it is a multi-day tour
it's not a race it's a tour so ride at
your leisure r at your own pace there
are several days and distances to choose
from you can learn more details linked
in the description below the next event
is another Arkansas event and this event
takes in the Arkansas High Country but
it's not for the average punter this
event is 1,000 m in length or 1,600 km
if you prefer in metric and it will test
your mental fortitude your bike
everything really it is a race and one
of my good mates Jim Phillips of
Springfield Missouri absolute Legend
good day mate if you're watching he's
finished this event he's a crazy bugger
in fact here's a photograph of me
hanging out with Jim somewhere in the
midwest what are we doing with our lives
mate anyway I do you can learn more
about this Ultra crazy Ultra
longdistance event by checking out the
link in the description below and we
have another Arkansas event for your
cycling pleasure this is the chinkapin
Holo and it happens in fville Arkansas
it has been around for several years
this event also wanders across the
border into Oklahoma so that's a nice
bonus isn't it there's a bunch of
distances on offer with the longest
distance being 10 Mi I'm sure it will
challenge you I have not ridden the
event but you can learn more by checking
out the link in the description below
next up we're over to Cape Carter Ray in
North Carolina for the crowan buck 50 an
event that's been around for quite some
time and if I've got my Intel right the
bloku founded Ridge Supply socks well he
is is the ride director Cape Carter is
near the coast so that guarantees a
pretty flat course there are several
distance being 150 Mi or a buck 50 if
you prefer there's also 50 100 and I
think a shorter option either way the
details can be found Linked In the
description below the next events are
also in North Carolina and they are
presented by Transylvania Productions
the first event is the uari forest
gravel grinder which has been around
around for many many years there are two
distances on offer and I can tell you
that area is quite hilly so be sure to
bring your climbing gears you'll thank
me later and that recommendation goes
for both distances short and long now if
you prefer something flatter
Transylvania Productions has an event
closer to the coast near Rocky Mount
North Carolina and this is the Holly
Shelter gravel grinder there are several
distances on offer and whilst this might
be flatter this does doesn't mean it's
going to be easier because if you're
racing this event it's likely going to
be very very fast details of
Transylvania Productions can be seen
event is also in North Carolina it is
the dirt digler and it happens in
Hendersonville North Carolina which is
conveniently located between Asheville
North Carolina and Greenville South
Carolina this event takes in parts of
the DuPont recreational State Forest
I've ridden there a couple of times on a
gravel bike there's some technical and
there's plenty of climbing so once again
bring your low gears be sure to check it
out Linked In the description below the
next event comes to you from that gravel
Paradise of Hickman County in Tennessee
this is the eighth running of the gosh
darn gravel gathering this event is a
super fun multi-day camping riding
experience this event benefits the AOA
Cent's Bicycle Workshop a local program
that has positively impacted the lives
of some 4,000 Middle Tennessee youth it
gives back to the community you can
learn more about this fun camp riding
experiences and more Linked In the
description below next up another
Tennessee event the hardford 50 and the
hardford 75 cute names there those names
refer to the distances on offer 50 Mi
and 75 Mi just to give you an idea of
how challenging this event is the 75 M
variant has 10,000 ft of climbing in 75
M so once again if you're heading to
Tennessee pack your low climbing gears
description below next up the final in
this volume two of Southeastern gravel
alliance Deep Woods gravel grinder a
long weekend of Grassroots gravel
cycling in the Cherokee National Forest
very close to Chattanooga Tennessee and
Atlanta Georgia for that matter there
are ride and race options on offer and
if you happen to race this is a 2-day
event totaling 115 Mi you're in store
for 15,000 ft of elevation you do the
math very challenging writing no matter
how you look at it but with spectacular
scenery for your viewing pleasure righty
Trend Setters that wraps up this edition
of gravel cycling events you should know
about the Southeastern Edition volume
two be sure to check out volume one
Linked In the description below there's
a good chance there's an event or two
that I possibly missed so if you think
there's an event that is worthy of
consideration please leave a positive
comment below and coming soon future
editions of gravel cycling events you
should know about in other parts of the
United States and hopefully if all goes
to plan other parts of the world TR cers
it's time to wrap up this video because
I'm starting to freeze my ass off out
here sitting out front of the house and
it's
34° fah here in North Central Florida
it's a veritable polar
vortex all righty as always thank you
for watching if you haven't already
please consider subscribing to the
gravel cycles YouTube channel for
interesting factoid videos such as this
one no bull gravel bike reviews other
product reviews ride experience videos
and of course my
favorite General Madness
all right then as all of it is released
to the channel I'll see you in the next
video I need to warm my hands up they
are freezing
[Music]
